item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0142; 04:51AM; 1820 E 48th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DWMchm; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: 82 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 34 minutes. Crews had to make their way over 150' deep into the large building filled with shelves of textiles to reach the seat of the fire. There are no injuries reported. A small amount of fire was quickly extinguished in the building adjacent to the fire unit. Crews will remain on scene through the morning conducting overhaul operations which will impact traffic in the area. Due to the size of the fire, LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR15 AR21 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E1 E10 E14 E17 E2 E203 E209 E21 E215 E221 E233 E5 E9 EA1 EM1 EM13 HR3 RA14 RA17 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0142; 04:06AM; 1820 E 48th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DWMchm; Central-Alameda; Building size updated to approximately 200' x 400'. Firefighters are continuing to make their way into the building to conduct an offensive attack on heavy fire to the rear (Charlie side). This incident is at the Greater Alarm status. ; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E1 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E21 E221 E233 E5 E9 EM13 HR3 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0142; 03:17AM; 1820 E 48th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DWMchm; Central-Alameda; Large one story commercial building, approximately 100' x 300' with fire showing towards the rear. Additional resources requested (shown in this alert). ; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E1 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E21 E221 E233 E5 E9 EM13 HR3 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1600; 09:53PM; 1448 W 3rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xg5hZJ; Westlake; One 64yo M patient transported for smoke inhalation in unknown condition. One 72 yo F being assessed for smoke inhalation, transport decision not yet made. Contrary to some reports, there are no further patients and no children involved. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E11 E20 E203 E209 E211 E220 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA13 RA209 RA4 RA811 RA9 SQ21 T11 T20 T3 T9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1600; 09:38PM; 1448 W 3rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xg5hZJ; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes. The fire was contained to the unit of origin on the 2nd floor and prevented from extending into the attic. Three patients are being evaluated for possible smoke inhalations. No further details.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E11 E20 E203 E209 E211 E220 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA13 RA209 RA4 RA811 RA9 SQ21 T11 T20 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire - Fire Now Out 11/22/2021 INC#1350

item.description: Structure Fire - Fire Now Out; INC#1350; 06:44PM; 13332 W Dyer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FBXo3F; Sylmar; Firefighters extinguished fire in a single family dwelling in 23 minutes. The fire appears to have started on the back patio and extended into the structure. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 6:21PM. Cause and $ loss TBD. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 E98 RA891 RA91 RA98 T75 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1214; 05:41PM; 1330 N Orange Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CUJNCV; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes, containing it to the original fire unit with no extension. Two dogs were pulled from the unit and are being treated for smoke inhalation on scene. Their conditions are unknown at this time. There are no other injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E226 E227 E229 E261 E41 E76 RA61 RA76 T26 T27 T29 T61; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle - Fatality; INC#1220; 05:16PM; 13470 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/30LKcdS; Granada Hills; Two car collision with a total of two patients. One is being extricated from the vehicle (non-life threatening injuries) and one was determined dead on scene. (age/genders unknown at this time). All questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 3423 and LA County Coroner for the investigation. No further details. ; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E275 E287 E75 E87 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA87 RA91 T75 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1214; 05:14PM; 1330 N Orange Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CUJNCV; Hollywood; Four story (three residential over parking) center hall apartment building with fire in one unit on the 3rd floor. There are initial reports of dog(s) (number unknown) in the unit and being evacuated by firefighters. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and all other occupants are sheltering in place.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E226 E227 E261 E41 E76 RA61 RA76 T26 T27 T61; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
